bio: Nurtured Ideas is a record label and artist management company dedicated to giving artists the close care and attention necessary to grow long-term careers in the music and entertainment industry. With more than a decade of shared experience navigating the ever-changing music industry, the Nurtured team believes the real business is in empowering artists to tell their story in a meaningful way to an engaged and captivated audience. Nurtured makes use of time-tested and meaningful relationships to quietly and effectively make sense of behind-the-scenes business, leaving artists the space to put time and energy into the work of creation and connection.
